metadata.name: Humans A.I. #31
metadata.description:
I set up my artistic research with artificial intelligence - working with DALLÂ·E 2 - as a journey into my subconscious, staging only my imagination.
I started looking for faces of couples that represented emotional situations.
This research involved me so much in the continuous and deepening iteration with artificial intelligence.
I did not want to give definitions for the different types of couples.
Each couple seems to have its own story, its own particular relationship, and I leave it to the viewer to interpret the looks on these faces, to be fascinated by them, as I was.
The stripes are the common feature, my "signature" on the photos.
I accept facial imperfections as a feature of artificial intelligence.
I called the collection "Humans A.I.", fascinated by these photographic portraits of people who do not exist, but are there, waiting for our gaze to return theirs.
